name: Game Of Life (itch) (lvl_up)
description:
Game of Life is a computer simulation by John Horton Conway.

[set to full screen for optimal rendering]

Click on several cells glued together or not and check "Running" to launch the simulation.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game of Life est une simulation informatique de John Horton Conway.

[mettre en plein écran pour un rendu optimal]

Cliquez sur plusieurs cellules collées ou non et cochez "Running" pour lancer la simulation.
